headline: Pentair Announces Quarterly Cash Dividend of $0.25
summary: LONDON, February 24, 2025--Pentair plc (NYSE: PNR) announced today that it will pay a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.25 per share on May 2, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on April 18, 2025. This is the 49th consecutive year that Pentair has increased its dividend.
